name: Space Range
description:
Space Range is out now.

Your mission is simple, get the HIGHEST SCORE! Understood?

Space Range is a classic arcade space shooter in the quiet of Space Invaders. But the small subtle difference is, SPACE-SHUTTLE vs. SPUTNIK !!!

It is currently only available for Android, a PC Beta is planed for the future.

I would be very grateful for comments and bug reports.
I'm always open to incentives and ideas for new content.

Have fun by Playing :)
